		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield

			scope:locale = flag:courtyard

	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = shame
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = scheme
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}

			desc = LIDAc.4.desc.20
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {

					}
					desc = LIDAc.4.desc.21
				}

					trigger = {
						scope:subdom > -10

					}

				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom <= -10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.4.desc.23
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		become_more_sub_effect = { AMOUNT = 3.0 }
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			become_more_dom_effect = { AMOUNT = 3.0 }
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.3
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

LIDAc.3 = {
	# FM_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB: Down the Gullet
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.3.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}

		}

		}

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room

	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = shame
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = schadenfreude
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10000310
				}
				# Sub Blowjob
				# You don't resist when he plunges into your mouth to deposit his seed.\n

					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 11000310
				}
				# Deepthroat
				# You don't have any say in it, or in anything else at the moment, as his mass fills your throat.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.11.3.0
			}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -10000800
				}
				# 10000800: EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n

			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -10000110
				}
				# 10000110: EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.FM_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed

				desc = sex_transition.CUM.10.1.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -11001000
				}
				# 11001000: EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you push and try to stop his thrusts. It's all in vain, however, as he ignores you.\n
				desc = sex_transition.11.10.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 10
			}
			# defaulted to 10000310: EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.FM_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.10.3.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 11
			}
			# defaulted to 11000310: EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.FM_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.11.3.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = {
			desc = LIDAc.3.desc.20
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom >= 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.3.desc.21
				}
			}
			desc = LIDAc.3.desc.22
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom <= -10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.3.desc.23
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.3.desc.24
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.3.desc.25
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		become_more_sub_effect = { AMOUNT = 4.0 }
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			become_more_dom_effect = { AMOUNT = 4.0 }
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.5
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 3
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAc.5 = {
	# FM_RUINED_ORGASM: A Firm Grasp on His Release
	type = character_event

	theme = seduction
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {

			become_more_sub_effect = { AMOUNT = 7.0 }
		}

			add_character_modifier = {
				modifier = sexually_frustrated
				years = 1
			}
		}

	}

		name = LIDAoption.6
	}

		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}

LIDAc.8 = {
	# FM_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS: More Icing on the Cake
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.8.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		reference = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		reference = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		reference = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		reference = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		reference = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		reference = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		reference = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		reference = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		reference = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		reference = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		reference = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		reference = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		reference = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = personality_bold
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 9000810
				}
				# Standing Fucked from Behind
				# "Pull it out, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]!", you manage to voice between his wild thrusts and loud groans.\n

				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 4
			}
			# defaulted to 4000710: EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE -> EventsCum.FM_CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.4.7.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 14
			}
			# defaulted to 14000710: EventsSex.FM_ASS_RUB -> EventsCum.FM_CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.14.7.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 12
			}
			# defaulted to 12000710: EventsSex.FM_HOTDOG -> EventsCum.FM_CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.12.7.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 13
			}
			# defaulted to 13000710: EventsSex.FM_STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.FM_CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.13.7.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = {
			desc = LIDAc.7.desc.20
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom >= 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.7.desc.21
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom > -10 
scope:subdom < 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.7.desc.22
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom <= -10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.7.desc.23
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.7.desc.24
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.7.desc.25
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0.3
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		become_more_sub_effect = { AMOUNT = 1.0 }
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			become_more_dom_effect = { AMOUNT = 1.0 }
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.8
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

	# FM_CREAMPIE_ON_TOP: Cherry on Top

			scope:locale = flag:battlefield

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 16
			}
			# defaulted to 16001010: EventsSex.FM_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_ON_TOP
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.16.10.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = {
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.20
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom < -10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.10.desc.21
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom > -10 
scope:subdom < 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.10.desc.22
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom > 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.10.desc.23
				}
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.24
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.10.desc.25
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 3
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 30
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		become_more_dom_effect = { AMOUNT = 6.0 }
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			become_more_sub_effect = { AMOUNT = 6.0 }
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.10
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAc.11 = {
	# FM_CREAMPIE_BREED: Something to Remember Him By
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.11.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}

		reference = dungeon

		}
		reference = market

		}
		reference = tavern
	}

		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		reference = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		reference = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		reference = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		reference = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		reference = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		reference = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = worry
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = personality_bold
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 17001110
				}
				# Lie on Back
				# His rod gets even harder as his relentless pounding reaches your deepest spot, #bold drowning#! your thoughts in euphoria.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.17.11.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 18001110
				}
				# Lie Face Down
				# His rod gets even harder as his relentless pounding reaches your deepest spot, #bold drowning#! your thoughts in euphoria.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.18.11.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -17001600
				}
				# 17001600: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.FM_COWGIRL failed
				# You unbalance [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] as he's recovering from a thrust and manage to get on your side, but he grabs and puts you back down.\n
				desc = sex_transition.17.16.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -17000810
				}
				# 17000810: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.FM_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "Not inside!" you barely blurt out between moans and labored breaths, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.17.8.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -17001210
				}
				# 17001210: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_KEEP failed
				# You try to wrap your legs and arms around him, but his wild thrusting makes it impossible to hold on.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.17.12.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -18001700
				}
				# 18001700: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY failed
				# You try to roll in place, but [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s #bold paralyzing#! barrage of thrusts never slows enough to do so.\n
				desc = sex_transition.18.17.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -18000900
				}
				# 18000900: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND failed
				# You try to find a moment to pull your knees under you, but each attempt is thwarted by his wild thrashing.\n
				desc = sex_transition.18.9.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -18000810
				}
				# 18000810: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.FM_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "D-Don't fill me!" you shakingly say as his pounding nearly drives you senseless, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.18.8.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 17
			}
			# defaulted to 17001110: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_BREED
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.17.11.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 18
			}
			# defaulted to 18001110: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_BREED
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.18.11.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = {
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.20
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.21
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.22
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 } 
 NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.23
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }

					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.24
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.25
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom >= 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.26
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom >= 20
					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.27
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom >= 10

					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.28
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom >= 10

					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.29
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom <= -10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.30
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {

					}

				}

						scope:subdom <= -10

					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.32
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom <= -10

					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.33
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.34
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 } 
 NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.35
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 } 
 has_trait = pregnant
					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.36
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = { has_trait =pregnant }

 NOT = { has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 } }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.37
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait =pregnant 
 NOT = { has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 } } 
 NOT = { has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 } }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.11.desc.38
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -6
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner

			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0

			DRAMA = yes

			become_more_dom_effect = { AMOUNT = 9.0 }
		}

		name = LIDAoption.11
	}

		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

	# FM_CREAMPIE_KEEP: Bearing the Bloodline
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.12.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night

		}

		}
		reference = tavern
	}

			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		reference = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		reference = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		reference = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		reference = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		reference = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		reference = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = ecstasy
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = shock
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 17001210
				}
				# Lie on Back
				# You wrap your legs and arms around him...\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.17.12.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -17001600
				}
				# 17001600: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.FM_COWGIRL failed
				# You unbalance [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] as he's recovering from a thrust and manage to get on your side, but he grabs and puts you back down.\n
				desc = sex_transition.17.16.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -17000810
				}
				# 17000810: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.FM_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "Not inside!" you barely blurt out between moans and labored breaths, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.17.8.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -17001210
				}
				# 17001210: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_KEEP failed
				# You try to wrap your legs and arms around him, but his wild thrusting makes it impossible to hold on.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.17.12.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 17
			}
			# defaulted to 17001210: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_KEEP
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.17.12.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = {
			desc = LIDAc.12.desc.20
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom >= 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.12.desc.21
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom < 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.12.desc.22
				}
			}
			desc = LIDAc.12.desc.23
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.12.desc.24
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.12.desc.25
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 60
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		become_more_dom_effect = { AMOUNT = 4.0 }
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			become_more_sub_effect = { AMOUNT = 4.0 }
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.12
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 12
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAc.13 = {
	# MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND: A Load in Hand is Worth Two in the Bush
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.13.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		reference = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		reference = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		reference = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {

		reference = docks

		}
		reference = market

			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room

	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = boredom

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}

		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 24001310

				}

			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -27002800
				}
				# 27002800: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT failed

			}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -27001510
				}
				# 27001510: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB failed
				# You plunge deep into her mouth to deposit your seed, but she manages to pull away before your release.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.27.15.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -27001610
				}
				# 27001610: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE failed
				# You pull her head away and to look up, preparing to to mark her face, but she pulls away in time.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.27.16.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 24
			}
			# defaulted to 24001310: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsCum.MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.24.13.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 27
			}
			# defaulted to 27001310: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.27.13.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_m
		}
		desc = {
			desc = LIDAc.13.desc.20
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom >= 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.13.desc.21
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom > -10

					}
					desc = LIDAc.13.desc.22
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom <= -10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.13.desc.23
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		become_more_sub_effect = { AMOUNT = 4.0 }
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			become_more_dom_effect = { AMOUNT = 4.0 }
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.13
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 13
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

	# MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE: Painting her Face
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.16.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {

		}
		reference = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		reference = courtyard
	}

		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		reference = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		reference = docks
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		reference = feast

	override_background = {

		}
		reference = throne_room

		}
		reference = bedchamber

	override_background = {

		}
		reference = study

	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		reference = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked

				no_clothes
			}
		}

			trigger = {

			}

			}
		}
	}

				}

			}

			}

					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 40001610

				# You pull her head away and to look up, preparing to to mark her face.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.40.16.0

					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 41001610
				}

				# You pull her head away and to look up, preparing to to mark her face.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.41.16.0
			}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 27001610
				}

			# defaulted to 27001610: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.27.16.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_m
		}
		desc = {
			desc = LIDAc.16.desc.20
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom >= 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.16.desc.21
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom > -10

					}
					desc = LIDAc.16.desc.22
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom <= -10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.16.desc.23
				}
			}
			desc = LIDAc.16.desc.24
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.16.desc.25
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = { has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 } } 
 NOT = { has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 } }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.16.desc.26
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.16.desc.27
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		become_more_dom_effect = { AMOUNT = 3.0 }
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			become_more_sub_effect = { AMOUNT = 3.0 }
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.15
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 16
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

	# MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_DOM: Satisfying her Sweet Tooth

	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield

LIDAc.15 = {
	# MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB: Down the Gullet
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.15.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		reference = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		reference = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		reference = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		reference = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		reference = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		reference = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		reference = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		reference = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		reference = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		reference = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		reference = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		reference = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		reference = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = schadenfreude
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = shame
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 27001510
				}
				# Blowjob
				# You plunge deep into her mouth to deposit your seed.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.27.15.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 28001510
				}
				# Deepthroat
				# She doesn't have any say in it, or in anything else at the moment, as your mass fills her throat.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.28.15.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -27002700
				}
				# 27002700: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# You adjust your posture to get better strokes, but [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] stops you in your track with a deviously timed lick.\n
				desc = sex_transition.27.27.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -27002800
				}
				# 27002800: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT failed
				# You take advantage of [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s lack of strong resistance to dominate her mouth further. However, her lack of resistance was a facade and she instead uses this opportunity to take back some control.\n
				desc = sex_transition.27.28.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -27001510
				}
				# 27001510: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB failed
				# You plunge deep into her mouth to deposit your seed, but she manages to pull away before your release.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.27.15.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -27001610
				}
				# 27001610: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE failed
				# You pull her head away and to look up, preparing to to mark her face, but she pulls away in time.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.27.16.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -28002800
				}
				# 28002800: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT failed
				# You continue fucking her throat, but she manages to slow your pace down with hands pressed against your waist.\n
				desc = sex_transition.28.28.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 27
			}
			# defaulted to 27001510: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.27.15.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 28
			}
			# defaulted to 28001510: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.28.15.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_m
		}
		desc = {
			desc = LIDAc.15.desc.20
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom >= 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.15.desc.21
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom <= -10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.15.desc.22
				}
			}
			desc = LIDAc.15.desc.23
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.15.desc.24
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.15.desc.25
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		become_more_dom_effect = { AMOUNT = 4.0 }
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			become_more_sub_effect = { AMOUNT = 4.0 }
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.17
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 15
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAc.17 = {
	# MF_RUINED_ORGASM: A Firm Grasp on Your Release

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield

					}
					desc = LIDAc.17.desc.21
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = { has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 } }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.17.desc.22
				}
			}
			desc = LIDAc.17.desc.23
		}

			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		become_more_sub_effect = { AMOUNT = 7.0 }
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			become_more_dom_effect = { AMOUNT = 7.0 }
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			add_character_modifier = {
				modifier = sexually_frustrated
				years = 1
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.18
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 17
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAc.20 = {
	# MF_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS: More Icing on the Cake
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.20.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		reference = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		reference = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		reference = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		reference = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		reference = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		reference = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		reference = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		reference = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		reference = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		reference = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		reference = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		reference = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		reference = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = personality_bold
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 26002010
				}
				# Standing Fuck from Behind
				# "Pull it out, [ROOT.Char.GetFirstName]!", she manages to voice between your wild thrusts and loud groans.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.26.20.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 32002010
				}
				# Ride Facing Away
				# She puts her hand on your rod, guiding you to unload on her cheeks instead\n

					trigger = {

					}
					desc = LIDAc.20.desc.21
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom >= 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.20.desc.22
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.20.desc.23
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.20.desc.24
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 1.5
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		become_more_sub_effect = { AMOUNT = 2.0 }
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			become_more_dom_effect = { AMOUNT = 2.0 }
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.19
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

LIDAc.21 = {
	# MF_CREAMPIE_REGULAR: Plowing the Fields
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.21.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		reference = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		reference = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		reference = dungeon

	override_background = {

		}
		reference = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		reference = feast

	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		reference = market
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		reference = tavern
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		reference = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		reference = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		reference = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		reference = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		reference = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		reference = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = worry
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = personality_bold
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 26002110
				}
				# Standing Fuck from Behind
				# Feeling little resistance, you prepare to plant your seed inside.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.26.21.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 32002110
				}
				# Ride Facing Away
				# Feeling little resistance, you prepare to plant your seed inside.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.32.21.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 33002110
				}
				# Ride Facing You
				# Feeling little resistance, you prepare to plant your seed inside.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.33.21.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -26002600
				}
				# 26002600: EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND failed
				# You continue pistoning her from behind, but she finds a moment where you strength falters and manages to regain some control.\n
				desc = sex_transition.26.26.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -26003500
				}
				# 26003500: EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE failed
				# You expected to tire her out with your vigorous motions, but the #italic opposite#! happens.\n
				desc = sex_transition.26.35.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -26002110
				}
				# 26002110: EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_REGULAR failed
				# [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] eludes your attempt to plant your seed inside her.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.26.21.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -32002600
				}
				# 32002600: EventsSex.MF_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND failed
				# You try to regain some control by standing up, but she stays firmly on top of you.\n
				desc = sex_transition.32.26.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -32003500
				}
				# 32003500: EventsSex.MF_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE failed
				# You try to stand up, but she pushes you down from above you.\n
				desc = sex_transition.32.35.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -32002110
				}
				# 32002110: EventsSex.MF_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_REGULAR failed
				# [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] eludes your attempt to plant your seed inside her.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.32.21.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -33002900
				}
				# 33002900: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_HOTDOG failed
				# You try to pull out and get up, but she clamps down on that idea hard.\n
				desc = sex_transition.33.29.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -33003400
				}
				# 33003400: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY failed
				# With a spurt of strength, you try to overturn her dominant position and put her on her back, but she puts that to a stop with a squeeze to your balls.\n
				desc = sex_transition.33.34.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -33002110
				}
				# 33002110: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_REGULAR failed
				# [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] eludes your attempt to plant your seed inside her.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.33.21.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 26
			}
			# defaulted to 26002110: EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_REGULAR
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.26.21.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 32
			}
			# defaulted to 32002110: EventsSex.MF_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_REGULAR
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.32.21.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 33
			}
			# defaulted to 33002110: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_REGULAR
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.33.21.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_m
		}
		desc = {
			desc = LIDAc.21.desc.20
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom >= 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.21.desc.21
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom > -10 
scope:subdom < 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.21.desc.22
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom <= -10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.21.desc.23
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.21.desc.24
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						 NOT = { has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 } } 
  NOT = { has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 } }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.21.desc.25
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.21.desc.26
				}
			}
			desc = LIDAc.21.desc.27
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 3
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 30
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		become_more_dom_effect = { AMOUNT = 4.0 }
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			become_more_sub_effect = { AMOUNT = 4.0 }
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.21
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 21
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

	# MF_CREAMPIE_ON_TOP: Cherry on Top
	type = character_event

	theme = seduction
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}

		}

		}

		}

				exists = scope:root_naked

				no_clothes

		}

				no_clothes

		}

	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {

					exists = scope:sex_transition

				}

			}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 33002210
				}

				# Your body tightens as you release inside her while she pins you down.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.33.22.0

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -33003400
				}
				# 33003400: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY failed

			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -33002110
				}
				# 33002110: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_REGULAR failed
				# [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] eludes your attempt to plant your seed inside her.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.33.21.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 32
			}
			# defaulted to 32002210: EventsSex.MF_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_ON_TOP
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.32.22.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 33
			}
			# defaulted to 33002210: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_ON_TOP
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.33.22.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_m
		}
		desc = {
			desc = LIDAc.22.desc.20
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom >= 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.22.desc.21
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom > -10

					}
					desc = LIDAc.22.desc.22
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom <= -10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.22.desc.23
				}
			}
			desc = LIDAc.22.desc.24
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.22.desc.25
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = { has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 } }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.22.desc.26
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 3
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 30
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		become_more_sub_effect = { AMOUNT = 6.0 }
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			become_more_dom_effect = { AMOUNT = 6.0 }
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.22
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 22
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAc.23 = {
	# MF_CREAMPIE_BREED: Something to Remember You By
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.23.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		reference = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		reference = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		reference = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		reference = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		reference = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		reference = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		reference = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		reference = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		reference = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		reference = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		reference = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		reference = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		reference = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = personality_bold
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = worry
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 34002310
				}
				# Missionary
				# Your rod gets even harder as your climax approaches, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] #bold moaning loudly#! as she quivers uncontrollably.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.34.23.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 35002310
				}
				# Putting Her in Her Place
				# Your rod gets even harder as your climax approaches, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] #bold moaning loudly#! as she quivers uncontrollably.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.35.23.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -34003500
				}
				# 34003500: EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE failed
				# Try as you might, you fail to find an opportunity to roll her onto her belly and give you more control.\n
				desc = sex_transition.34.35.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -34002310
				}
				# 34002310: EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_BREED failed
				# Your rod gets even harder as your climax approaches, but at the last moment your rod #italic slips#! out.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.34.23.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -35003500
				}
				# 35003500: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE failed
				# You relentlessly keep pounding [affairs_partner.GetFirstName], her loud moans distracting you just enough for her to make a move.\n
				desc = sex_transition.35.35.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -35002310
				}
				# 35002310: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_BREED failed
				# Your rod gets even harder as your climax approaches, but at the last moment your rod #italic slips#! out.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.35.23.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 34
			}
			# defaulted to 34002310: EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_BREED
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.34.23.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 35
			}
			# defaulted to 35002310: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_BREED
			desc = sex_transition.CUM.35.23.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_m
		}
		desc = {
			desc = LIDAc.23.desc.20
			desc = LIDAc.23.desc.21
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_sub_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.23.desc.22
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = { has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 } }

					}
					desc = LIDAc.23.desc.23
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait_xp = { trait =  lida_dom_track value >= lida_track_xp_stage_1 }
					}
					desc = LIDAc.23.desc.24
				}
			}
			desc = LIDAc.23.desc.25
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom >= 10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.23.desc.26
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom > -10

					}
					desc = LIDAc.23.desc.27
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						scope:subdom <= -10
					}
					desc = LIDAc.23.desc.28
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -6
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 45.0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		become_more_dom_effect = { AMOUNT = 9.0 }
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			become_more_sub_effect = { AMOUNT = 9.0 }
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.23
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 23
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
